title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access
summary: Implement multi-factor authentication and access control mechanisms
description: Develop secure authentication workflows allowing customers to log in using multi-factor authentication. Implement role-based access control (RBAC) ensuring users can view and access only services relevant to their profiles. Ensure session security, password management, and compliance with financial data protection policies.

title: Personalized User Dashboard
summary: Provide a personalized dashboard displaying eligible banking products and services
description: Design and implement a customizable dashboard that dynamically displays relevant banking products, services, and account details based on the user’s profile and eligibility. Ensure the dashboard is intuitive, responsive, and allows easy access to key features with minimal navigation effort.

title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Enable seamless self-service for account requests and modifications
description: Develop structured workflows that allow users to open new accounts, modify account details, or request additional services without visiting a branch. The workflows should require minimal clicks, have contextual guidance, and ensure data validation for a smooth user experience.

title: Status Tracking and Notifications
summary: Provide real-time tracking and notifications for submitted requests
description: Implement a real-time tracking system that provides users with visibility into the status of their account or service requests. Integrate email and on-site notifications to keep users informed about progress, approvals, and pending actions.

title: Draft Saving and Document Management
summary: Allow users to save applications and upload documentation securely
description: Introduce functionality enabling users to save incomplete account or service applications as drafts. Provide a secure document upload interface for users to attach supporting documents, ensuring encrypted storage and data integrity.

title: Core Banking Integration and Data Synchronization
summary: Integrate with the bank’s core systems for real-time operations
description: Connect the self-service portal with core banking and CRM systems via secure APIs. Ensure real-time synchronization of account details, requests, and user profile data. Implement error handling and data integrity checks to maintain reliability.

title: Interaction History and Audit Logging
summary: Maintain a log of all user interactions and requests
description: Develop a feature to track and store all customer interactions and service requests for transparency and regulatory compliance. Ensure logs are accessible for users and auditable by administrators for security reviews.

title: Responsive Design and Cross-Device Optimization
summary: Ensure consistent user experience across multiple devices
description: Implement adaptive and responsive design principles to make the portal seamlessly accessible via desktop, tablet, and mobile. Focus on maintaining consistent performance, design harmony, and optimal loading times across devices.
